channel.title: Web Client Help Please!
channel.description:
Hi, I followed Ric's tutorial on making a web client and last night I got everything working except it wouldn't find my sprites, I re-read ric's tutorial and found out that I had missed a step, So I went back and re did it... I set the ./Sprites/ to C:/.rs2forum_file_store_32/Sprites/ (rs2forum is my server/clients name) after i did that re jarred and re signed my client and uploaded it to my server.. now after it downloads as the cache, after it "unpacks the files" I get this [URL=http://img39.imageshack.us/i/errorbj.jpg/][IMG]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/8755/errorbj.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Any idea on how to fix this? anyone know what i did wrong, please specify if you have the solution im sorta new to java.
to see my client in action please visit [url=http://www.rs2forum.net/webclient/client.php]http://www.rs2forum.net/webclient/client.php[/url] (not compatible with internet explorer OR opera... working on that)

item.title: Web Client Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @jesuslol1 jesuslol1
item.description:
@jesuslol1 wrote:

Hi, I followed Ric’s tutorial on making a web client and last night I got everything working except it wouldn’t find my sprites, I re-read ric’s tutorial and found out that I had missed a step, So I went back and re did it… I set the ./Sprites/ to
C:/.rs2forum_file_store_32/Sprites/ (rs2forum is my server/clients name)
after i did that re jarred and re signed my client and uploaded it to my server… now after it downloads as the cache, after it “unpacks the files” I get this

Any idea on how to fix this? anyone know what i did wrong, please specify if you have the solution im sorta new to java.

to see my client in action please visit http://www.rs2forum.net/webclient/client.php
(not compatible with internet explorer OR opera… working on that)
